channel.title: Possible Physics engine
channel.description: Has anyone ever noticed that very strange but hilarious physics deaths and unusual rag doll physics are prevalent in some user made maps and mods? My real question is is it possible to alter the Physics engine so things like a dinky pistol shot can unleash a Rube Goldberg'ish torrent of physics destrution?

item.title: Possible Physics engine
item.dc:creator: sersoft
item.description:
Many CS Source servers have different physics values that make things impossible to jump on, or makes the object behave less/more violently when damaged.

Read full topic

item.title: Possible Physics engine
item.dc:creator: LoLzman92
item.description:
JamesKane:

Possible and feasible are two different things.

I suppose my query is in the realm of, well… not feasible. Thank you for the reply:retard:

Read full topic

item.title: Possible Physics engine
item.dc:creator: Level
item.description:
Yeah, you’d have to make a map set up for it, modify the gun strengths and such.

This is a terrible thread and you should feel bad.

Read full topic
